channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- HL Twitter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- HL Twitter

item.title: CVE-2024-3629|2024-05-15T06:00:03.634Z -- Unknown -- HL Twitter
item.description: The HL Twitter WordPress plugin through 2014.1.18 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-3631|2024-05-15T06:00:04.054Z -- Unknown -- HL Twitter
item.description: The HL Twitter WordPress plugin through 2014.1.18 does not have CSRF check when unlinking twitter accounts, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins perform such actions via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-3630|2024-05-15T06:00:03.836Z -- Unknown -- HL Twitter
item.description: The HL Twitter WordPress plugin through 2014.1.18 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
